definitions.definition: A fastener or holder, particularly one that clasps.
definitions.example: I always have a hard time working the clasp on this necklace!

definitions.definition: (in the singular) An embrace, a grasp, or handshake.
definitions.example: He took her hand in a firm clasp.

definitions.definition: To take hold of; to grasp; to grab tightly.
definitions.example: They clasped hands and parted as friends.

definitions.definition: To shut or fasten together with, or as if with, a clasp.
